headline.main: The Rise of Emoji on Instagram Is Causing Language Repercussions

docs.snippet: Bryant University in Rhode Island has told its graduating seniors not to take pictures of themselves with their cellphones when they come onstage for their diplomas next month....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bryant University in Rhode Island has told its graduating seniors not to take pictures of themselves with their cellphones when they come onstage for their diplomas next month.
docs.abstract: Bryant University in Rhode Island tells its graduating seniors not to take pictures of themselves with their cellphones when they come onstage for their diplomas, in effort to keep the ceremony flowing; Ronald Machtley, president of the university, has promised every senior time for selfies when he and his wife open their home in the lead-up to commencement.

headline.main: Go Forth and Conquer, but Postpone the Selfie
headline.print_headline: Go Forth and Conquer, but Postpone the Selfie
